title: Larut Torrent Frog
desc:
Post 3125
Attack - None
Defense - None
- The Larut Torrent Frog is one of the fastest known frogs. It can select a player to learn the exact outcome of that player's ability.
Attributes -
- The Larut Torrent Frog also will stick around long enough to learn everything that happens to its target.
Goal - Keep your habitat from being destroyed and kill those who want to destroy it.
